channel.title: Templates on it-ninja
channel.description: Recent content in Templates on it-ninja

item.title: SDM Templates
item.description: Todo read more!! Cisco Site What is it? Predefined templates for system resource (TCAM) allocation. Allows for easy switch resource allocation based on role. Access If the MLS is running a lot of ACLs this template will allocate resources to handle the maximum number of ACLs. switch(config)# sdm prefer access Default Default. Treats all functions roughly the same. switch(config)# sdm prefer default Dual IPv4 and IPv6 For dual-stack switches.
